com.google.appinventor.blockseditor.jsonp
Class HttpServer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.blockseditor.jsonp.HttpServer

public final class HttpServer
extends Object

Extremely simple HTTP server.

Listens on a single port. Requests are handled one at a time, in the order they are received. All replies must be content type text.

Author:
lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

public void setHandler(String request,
                       HttpRequestHandler handler)
Register an HTTP request handler. This will replace any existing handler for the specified request.

Parameters:
request - the request
handler - the HTTP request handler to be registered.

runHttpServer

public void runHttpServer()
                   throws IOException
Runs the HTTP server. This method doesn't return until the server has been shut down.

Throws:
IOException
